lot_id: # Beginning Lots Template for PFIC QEF Tool
# lot_id: Unique identifier for this lot (e.g.
# ticker: Fund ticker symbol (must match config
# purchase_date: Date purchased in YYYY-MM-DD format (preferred
# quantity: Number of shares/units in this lot (up to 4 decimal places)
# cost_basis_usd: Total cost basis in USD (purchase price + fees
# original_lot_id: (optional) If this lot was split from another
# - These are lots you held at the START of the tax year (from prior years)
# - Lots purchased during the tax year should go in transactions.csv
# - Cost basis should already include any prior year QEF adjustments
# - The tool accepts both .csv and .json formats for lot files
# Example entries (delete these and add your own):
